publ: by 深圳市海曼科技有限公司
name: SmartHome
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
In order to use alexa, users should download the HiSmart APP from google play or Apple Store, and register HiSmart APP, then use the registered account and password to login in smart home skill. 
The APP download link: 
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.yunzhiyi_server

Skills:
Alexa, Discover devices. 
Alexa, Turn on plug
Alexa, Turn off plug
Alexa, Turn on security
Alexa, Turn off security
